__e: The curiosity is the fire that makes you six months continues.
Forgive my indiscretion, it's that... when I saw your van I was reminded of a memory... a year ago.
Anything new is bad, curiosity is bad. Going out at night is bad. Basically, anything fun is bad.
Some of the most important of these were curiosity and the pursuit of knowledge.
There's a sense of intrigue and mystery there because you don't really know why the fire is there.
I'm curious and I have time.
Maybe curious about someone that was close to me.
When you heard shots, weren't you curious to know what happened?
Jet: I'm going to find out what's on that tape if it kills me! Spike:
